casebody.data:
[The State ex rel.] Sinclair, Appellant, v. Industrial Commission of Ohio et al., Appellees.

[Cite as State ex rel. Sinclair v. Indus. Comm. (1998), 84 Ohio St.3d 224.]

(No. 97-647 Submitted October 27, 1998 Decided December 30, 1998.) Law Offices of James R. Nein, Matthew R. Copp and James R. Nein, for appellant. Betty D. Montgomery, Attorney General, and Michael A. Vanderhorst, Assistant Attorney General, for appellee Industrial Commission.

*225The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed consistent with the opinion of the court of appeals.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
